properties.entry: SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT B.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT A.USER_NO , A.USER_NICKNAME , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PHONE FROM USER_INFO A) B) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.BOOK_NO , A.BOOK_USER_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , A.BOOK_PERSONNEL , A.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , A.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOOK_NO , B.BOOK_USER_NAME , B.USER_ID , B.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , B.BOOK_PERSONNEL , B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , B.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM ( SELECT C.BOOK_NO , C.BOOK_USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , P.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , C.BOOK_PERSONNEL , C.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , C.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM BOOK_LIST C JOIN USER_INFO U ON (C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON ( C.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) )B )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT U.USER_ID , U.USER_PWD , U.USER_NICKNAME , U.USER_PHONE , P.POINT , U.USER_NO FROM USER_INFO U JOIN POINT P ON (U.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE U.USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO COUPON ( COUPON_NO , COUPON_START , COUPON_END , COUPON_CONDITION , COUPON_USE_YN , USER_NO , COUPON_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_COUPON_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , ? , ? )

SELECT A.RNUM , A.WITHDRAW_NO , A.USER_ID , A.WITHDRAW_REASON , A.WITHDRAWDATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.WITHDRAW_NO , B.USER_ID , B.WITHDRAW_REASON , B.WITHDRAWDATE FROM ( SELECT C.WITHDRAW_NO , U.USER_ID , C.WITHDRAW_REASON , U.WITHDRAWDATE FROM WITHDRAW_REASON C JOIN USER_INFO U ON (C.MEMBER_NO = U.USER_NO) ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT U.USER_ID , U.USER_NICKNAME , A.ACCOMO_NAME , R.ROOM_NAME , P.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , B.BOOK_PERSONNEL , B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , B.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE , B.BOOK_APPROVE_YN FROM BOOK_LIST B JOIN USER_INFO U ON (B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) JOIN ROOM_INFO R ON ( B.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO) JOIN ACCOMO_INFO A ON ( R.ACCOMO_NO = A.ACCOMO_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON ( B.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) WHERE B.BOOK_NO = ?
SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT B.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT A.USER_NO , A.USER_NICKNAME , A.USER_ID , A.USER_PHONE FROM USER_INFO A) B) C WHERE C.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO A WHERE A.USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WITHDRAW_REASON A JOIN USER_INFO B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.USER_NO) WHERE B.USER_ID = ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.WITHDRAW_NO , A.USER_ID , A.WITHDRAW_REASON , A.WITHDRAWDATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.WITHDRAW_NO , B.USER_ID , B.WITHDRAW_REASON , B.WITHDRAWDATE FROM ( SELECT C.WITHDRAW_NO , U.USER_ID , C.WITHDRAW_REASON , U.WITHDRAWDATE FROM WITHDRAW_REASON C JOIN USER_INFO U ON (C.MEMBER_NO = U.USER_NO) ) B ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.BOOK_NO , A.BOOK_USER_NAME , A.USER_ID , A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , A.BOOK_PERSONNEL , A.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , A.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BOOK_NO , B.BOOK_USER_NAME , B.USER_ID , B.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , B.BOOK_PERSONNEL , B.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , B.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM ( SELECT C.BOOK_NO , C.BOOK_USER_NAME , U.USER_ID , P.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , C.BOOK_PERSONNEL , C.BOOK_CHECK_DATE , C.BOOK_CHECKOUT_DATE FROM BOOK_LIST C JOIN USER_INFO U ON (C.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) JOIN PAYMENT P ON ( C.BOOK_NO = P.BOOK_NO) )B )A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK_LIST A JOIN USER_INFO B ON (A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO) JOIN PAYMENT C ON ( A.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO) WHERE B.USER_ID = ?
